{{Infobox Berry |name = #55 Custap |image = [[File:Custap.png]] |caption = The flesh underneath the Custap Berry's tough skin is sweet and creamy soft. |growtime = 7h 36m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,700 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *40 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Custap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sweet on the field. The [[Watmel]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-3240s || 3240-8280s || 8280-13320s || 13320-27360s || 27360-54720s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:CustapTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:CustapTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:CustapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Custap berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Watmel]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Watmel]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Watmel]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Watmel]] |- | || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] |- style="height: 26px;" | || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] |- | || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] |- | || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] || [[Watmel]] |}
